tool_description: The API of the Dogecoin blockchain - get info on an address and current network statistics.
name: Dogechain
title: Dogechain

api_list.name: Transactions
api_list.description: Returns the amount transactions of the last blocks.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://community-dogechain.p.rapidapi.com/transactions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-dogechain.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://community-dogechain.p.rapidapi.com/transactions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-dogechain.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Hash to Address
api_list.description: Returns the address with the given version prefix and hash.

api_list.name: Get Block Count
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://community-dogechain.p.rapidapi.com/getblockcount/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-dogechain.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Sent by Address
api_list.description: Returns the amount ever sent from a given address.

api_list.name: Totalbc
api_list.description: Returns the amount of currency ever mined

api_list.name: Address Balance
api_list.description: Returns amount ever received minus amount ever sent by a given address.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://community-dogechain.p.rapidapi.com/addressbalance/DTnt7VZqR5ofHhAxZuDy4m3PhSjKFXpw3e"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-dogechain.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://community-dogechain.p.rapidapi.com/addressbalance/{address}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-dogechain.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Received by Address
api_list.description: Returns the amount ever received by a given address.

api_list.name: Decode Address
api_list.description: Returns the version prefix and hash encoded in an address.

api_list.name: Get Difficulty
